title: aXpire (AXP) Price Tops $0.0409 on Top Exchanges
content: aXpire (CURRENCY:AXP) traded up 2.5% against the U.S. dollar during the 24 hour period ending at 17:00 PM ET on June 2nd. During the last week, aXpire has traded up 5.5% against the U.S. dollar. One aXpire token can now be purchased for $0.0409 or 0.00000536 BTC on major exchanges including IDEX, HitBTC and Kucoin. aXpire has a total market cap of $10.85 million and $27,542.00 worth of aXpire was traded on exchanges in the last day.    Here is how similar cryptocurrencies have performed during the last day:    Ripple (XRP) traded 4.3% higher against the dollar and now trades at $0.64 or 0.00008407 BTC.  Stellar (XLM) traded 4.2% higher against the dollar and now trades at $0.30 or 0.00003914 BTC.  IOTA (MIOTA) traded 0.9% higher against the dollar and now trades at $1.89 or 0.00024749 BTC.  TRON (TRX) traded 5.3% higher against the dollar and now trades at $0.0610 or 0.00000799 BTC.  NEO (NEO) traded 3.8% higher against the dollar and now trades at $56.56 or 0.00740923 BTC.  Tether (USDT) traded 1.1% lower against the dollar and now trades at $0.99 or 0.00012957 BTC.  VeChain (VEN) traded up 9.5% against the dollar and now trades at $3.72 or 0.00048676 BTC.  Binance Coin (BNB) traded 4.8% higher against the dollar and now trades at $14.71 or 0.00192636 BTC.  Ontology (ONT) traded up 10.4% against the dollar and now trades at $7.77 or 0.00101838 BTC.  Zilliqa (ZIL) traded up 7.7% against the dollar and now trades at $0.12 or 0.00001554 BTC.   aXpire Profile     aXpire was first traded on January 24th, 2018. aXpire’s total supply is 350,000,000 tokens and its circulating supply is 265,000,000 tokens. The official message board for aXpire is medium.com/@aXpire . The Reddit community for aXpire is /r/aXpire . aXpire’s official website is axpire.io . aXpire’s official Twitter account is @aXpire_official .  aXpire Token Trading    aXpire can be traded on these cryptocurrency exchanges: IDEX, HitBTC and Kucoin. It is usually not currently possible to purchase alternative cryptocurrencies such as aXpire directly using US dollars. Investors seeking to acquire aXpire should first purchase Ethereum or Bitcoin using an exchange that deals in US dollars such as Gemini, Changelly or GDAX. Investors can then use their newly-acquired Ethereum or Bitcoin to purchase aXpire using one of the aforementioned exchanges.
